headline: EMCOR (NYSE:EME) Surprises With Strong Q2, Full-Year Outlook Slightly Exceeds Expectations
summary: Specialty construction contractor company EMCOR (NYSE:EME) reported Q2 CY2025 results topping the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 17.4% year on year to $4.30 billion. The company’s full-year revenue guidance of $16.65 billion at the midpoint came in 1.1% above analysts’ estimates. Its GAAP profit of $6.72 per share was 17.9% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Emcor Group (EME) Surpasses Q2 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
summary: Emcor Group (EME) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +18.31% and +4.95%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Emcor Group: Q2 Earnings Snapshot
summary: EME) on Thursday reported second-quarter earnings of $302.2 million. On a per-share basis, the Norwalk, Connecticut-based company said it had net income of $6.72. The results exceeded Wall Street expectations.

headline: EMCOR Group, Inc. Reports Second Quarter 2025 Results
summary: NORWALK, Conn., July 31, 2025--EMCOR Group, Inc. (NYSE: EME) today reported results for the second quarter ended June 30, 2025.
